name: Mr Cat and Mouse Scooter Jump
name_original: Mr Cat and Mouse Scooter Jump
description:
BE WARNED: Insanely addictive!

Mr Cat and Mouse Scooter Jump your new hero! Help him jump his way through the ingenious and avoid enemies in its path.

Mr Cat and Mouse Scooter Jump will seriously challenge your skills and reflexes!

How to play:
Tap the screen to Jump and Double Tap to Double Jump.
